description: This dataset contains vector arrows and monthly mean sea surface currents speed in m/s for 2010 from January-June and is found in its original resolution of 1degree. All the analyis has been done in System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA).
keywords: Oceans, Ocean circulation, Ocean currents, OSCAR 1degree, Indian Ocean, Western
name: WIO Sea Surface Currents from OSCAR 1deg model
